scripts.start: echo 'Run services individually using cd <service> && yarn dev'
scripts.install:all: echo 'Installing all...' && yarn install:shared && yarn install:services
scripts.install:shared: cd shared/database && yarn && cd ../shared-config && yarn && cd ../shared-logger && yarn && cd ../shared-errors && yarn && cd ../shared-contracts && yarn && cd ../shared-kafka && yarn
scripts.install:services: cd api-gateway && yarn && cd ../auth-service && yarn && cd ../users-service && yarn && cd ../catalog-service && yarn && cd ../request-service && yarn && cd ../matching-service && yarn && cd ../tracking-service && yarn && cd ../review-service && yarn && cd ../earnings-service && yarn
